Text: Game doesnt even start up for me

BTW, to those concerned if this is legit or not, take a look at my version 1 of the crack, and read the majority of positive comments from different people here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7835317/Call_of_Duty_Black_Ops_II_REAL_Proper_Crack_-jKlark

I was really skeptical at first and scanned this at least 5 times, but no virus and it actually works! I got past the part it used to crash on me every time. Thanks!
Also, if some people don't know yet, Black ops 2 doesn't support windows xp so that could be your problem.

So I just flew and defeated some of mendez's guys, but when I was going into the temple the screen started jitterring and I couldn't move or anything.
However, I Ctrl-Alt-Del'd out and when I clicked back in The screen was black but when I clicked I could hear myself shooting, and when I threw a grenade I heard it. When I hit escape my mouse came up but nothing else. When I went over the invisible menu options, I heard the chink.
Solution?

PROTIP: As soon as the game starts, open up task manager, then go to the processes tab. Look for t6sp.exe (It has the description Call of Duty: Black Ops II) then right click, hover over change priority, then click "High" (It won't let you do realtime), click Accept, and then your game will run faster
